page.title: 04Housing.Haxby Road.
page.content: Haxby Road in 1985. Houses on Haxby Road normally have three storeys,but some have only two. All the houses on Haxby Road have bay windows.Some have dormer windows.Most of the houses have little gardens at the front.All of the bricks are red or yellow,except the Punch Bowl Hotel which is covered with plaster.The footpaths are made of paving stones.All the houses have chimneys. The roofs are made of red tiles or grey Welsh slate.There is a lot of traffic on Haxby Road.In 15 minutes 305 cars,45 lorries and vans,and 135 pedal cycles and motor cycles went by. Nathaniel Wheel.
